snippet: DuPont’s weak quarterly sales and reduced annual profit forecast is expected to provide fresh ammunition to the activist investor Nelson Peltz in his campaign to split up the chemical maker.
abstract: DuPont's weak quarterly sales and reduced annual profit forecast will provide fresh ammunition to activist investor Nelson Peltz, who is seeking to split up company.
lead_paragraph: DuPont’s weak quarterly sales and reduced annual profit forecast is expected to provide fresh ammunition to the activist investor Nelson Peltz in his campaign to split up the chemical maker.

headline.main: DuPont’s Underperformance Could Spur Activist Investor
headline.print_headline: Dupont’s Underperformance Could Spur Activist Investor
